summary: For now: Adds 2 greatswords, ingot and "food".
descriptionHtml:
Hi. [i]
[color=#ff0000]
[/color][/i][b][color=#ff0000]!!!WARNING!!![/color]
[/b][i]
[color=#ffff00]This is my first mod, so I'm sorry if something will be buggy or not working properly.[/color][/i]
[i][color=#ff0000]
This mod is [b]NOT[/b] lore friendly.
Item names and their descriptions (currently not added into item descriptions) are based on my own world that ain't related to Skyrim.[/color]
[color=#ff00ff]
 * first picture is from Blender, rest from within a game
[/color]
[/i]This mod includes: 2 custom greatswords, new ingot and new food/crafting material.

Anything in this mod won't drop from any enemy, but it's all craftable. No perk is needed, but you'll need a lot of Void Salts, Cooking pot and Skyforge. 

Crafting material: Ingot - Migdras - [color=#00ff00]finished[/color] ﻿ ﻿
﻿ ﻿      "Food" - Void Crystals - [color=#00ffff]will have new mesh[/color]
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ Something else -[color=#ffff00] maybe[/color][color=#ffff00]
[/color]
Weapons: Greatswords - Voidruler - [color=#00ff00]finished [/color]
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ Void Greatsword - [color=#00ff00]finished[/color]
[color=#00ffff] ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[/color]
﻿ [color=#00ffff]﻿ [/color]Greataxes - [color=#ffff00]maybe[/color]
﻿ War Hammers - [color=#ffff00]maybe
[/color] ﻿ ﻿ Swords - [color=#00ffff]will be
﻿[/color]﻿  War Axes - [color=#ffff00]maybe[/color]
﻿  Maces - [color=#ffff00]maybe[/color]
﻿ [color=#ffff00]﻿ [/color]Daggers - [color=#00ffff] will be
[/color]  ﻿ ﻿Staves - [color=#ffff00]maybe[/color]
﻿  Bows - [color=#ff7700]not this year[/color]

If you are asking if am I serious with Voidrulers stats, then answer is [b][color=#ffff00]YES! [/color][/b](It is meant to be op.)

Updates and their colors: I'll try to make at least 1 update per month, from rebalance to new weapon
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿    [color=#00ff00]green[/color] - update is out
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿    [color=#00ffff]blue[/color] - update will come same week as it was anounced
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿    [color=#ff0000]red [/color]- after this update there will be no update till I decide to make another one
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿    = more than month without update (prolly won't happen)
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿   white - old updates

﻿ ﻿Order of updates : Newly released update
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿        Planned update
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿        Old updates

[color=#00ff00][b]
Update 0.07:[/b][/color]  Meshes and textures got their own folders (no more wild and free, but caged)
﻿ ﻿ ﻿Void Greatsword - new mesh and textures (no more just a copy)
﻿ ﻿ ﻿Voidruler - improved some textures (looks better for me so I hope it will for you as well)
﻿ ﻿ ﻿Adjusted placement for both swords in hands (your hands can no longer go through Migdras)

[color=#00ffff]Update 0.08: [/color]New weapons: Void Twisted Sword 
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿Void Rune Sword

Update 0.06: Mod added
[color=#00ff00]
Please let me know if something is not working or is done wrong.[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000]Don't post or share this mod on any other website, I'll choose where it will be posted and where not.
[/color][/b]
Hope you'll like this mod.
author: lukbradac
